24  package org.hibernate.cache.spi.entry;
25  
26  import java.io.Serializable;
27  import java.util.HashMap;
28  import java.util.Map;
29  
30  import org.hibernate.engine.spi.SessionFactoryImplementor;
31  import org.hibernate.persister.entity.EntityPersister;
32  
33  /**
34   * Structured CacheEntry format for entities.  Used to store the entry into the second-level cache
35   * as a Map so that users can more easily see the cached state.
36   *
37   * @author Gavin King
38   * @author Steve Ebersole
39   */
40  public class StructuredCacheEntry implements CacheEntryStructure {
41  
42  	private EntityPersister persister;
43  
44  	public StructuredCacheEntry(EntityPersister persister) {
45  		this.persister = persister;
46  	}
47  	
48  	public Object destructure(Object item, SessionFactoryImplementor factory) {
49  		Map map = (Map) item;
50  		boolean lazyPropertiesUnfetched = ( (Boolean) map.get("_lazyPropertiesUnfetched") ).booleanValue();
51  		String subclass = (String) map.get("_subclass");
52  		Object version = map.get("_version");
53  		EntityPersister subclassPersister = factory.getEntityPersister(subclass);
54  		String[] names = subclassPersister.getPropertyNames();
55  		Serializable[] state = new Serializable[names.length];
56  		for ( int i=0; i<names.length; i++ ) {
57  			state[i] = (Serializable) map.get( names[i] );
58  		}
59  		return new StandardCacheEntryImpl( state, subclass, lazyPropertiesUnfetched, version );
60  	}
61  
62  	public Object structure(Object item) {
63  		CacheEntry entry = (CacheEntry) item;
64  		String[] names = persister.getPropertyNames();
65  		Map map = new HashMap( names.length + 3, 1f );
66  		map.put( "_subclass", entry.getSubclass() );
67  		map.put( "_version", entry.getVersion() );
68  		map.put( "_lazyPropertiesUnfetched", entry.areLazyPropertiesUnfetched() );
69  		for ( int i=0; i<names.length; i++ ) {
70  			map.put( names[i], entry.getDisassembledState()[i] );
71  		}
72  		return map;
73  	}
74  }
